txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Bulbous goo from insects and spiders in the Barrow-downs or toads from northern Bree-land. Deliver the items to Second-watcher Heathstraw at the Boar Fountain in Bree.
'As sticky as I expected; a little more foul, though. I guess I should thank you.\n\n'Thank you.'

'I am not quite sure what the use of this foul substance is, but I have it on request. Goo from either insects or toads; Barrow-downs for the insects, I gather, and north Bree-land along the large lake there for toads.'
Men of Bree Task:  Bulbous Goo
Second-watcher Heathstraw is offering compensation for the collection of bulbous goo from insects and spiders in the Barrow-downs or Old Forest or toads from northern Bree-land.
Deliver the bulbous goo to Second-watcher Heathstraw

You have been tasked with finding bulbous goo from the insects and spiders in the Barrows-downs or toads in northern Bree-land. Second-watcher Heathstraw awaits the delivery of these items at the Boar Fountain in Bree.
Wanted: Bulbous goo from insects and spiders in the Barrow-downs or toads from northern Bree-land.
